pre_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.

gpt_feedback:

final_feedback:

3，The scene is largely static, only before the camera zooms in, the pool surface is slightly visible in the top left corner, with gentle ripples.
final_caption: This video captures a view looking up at the wall of a swimming pool, showcasing the murky, greenish water. The wall is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. Initially, the scene is largely static, but before the camera zooms in, the pool surface is slightly visible in the top left corner, displaying gentle ripples.
